縲字的基本解释

縲
léi
见“缧”。

縲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［léi］
［《集韻》倫追切，平脂，來。］
亦作“纝1”。“缧1”的繁体字。
(1)捆绑犯人的黑色绳索。引申为捆绑，拘禁。
(2)见“縲縲”。

縲字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　縲； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页935第34
【廣韻】力追切【集韻】【韻會】倫追切，?音纍。【類篇】纍，或作縲。【論語】雖在縲絏之中。【註】縲，黑索也。【史記·太史公自序】幽於縲絏。　又【集韻】盧戈切，音驘。大索也。

bond
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［léi］
["Ji Yun" Lun chase after cutting, Pingzhi, come. ]
Also known as "纝1". Traditional characters for "缧1".
(1) The black rope that binds the prisoner. The extension is binding and detention.
(2) See "缧缧".
bond
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　缧; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 935 Page 34
[Guang Yun] Pursuing the cutting effort [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Pursing the cutting, the sound is tired. 【Classes】Tired, or confusing. [The Analects] Although it is in the shadows. 【Note】Yi, black rope also. 【Historical Records · Preface of Taishi Gong】Secluded in the 缧绁.　[Jiyun] Lu Geqie, sound 驘. Dasuo also.
